speakers.name: Dr. Arun S Nair IAS
speakers.designation: ADM Sabarimala & Director of multiple departments
speakers.content: A true pioneer in transforming civil service leadership, Dr. Arun S Nair IAS is known for his extraordinary journey from gold-medal physician to influential administrator, now shaping countless lives.

speakers.name: Vinitha Koshy
speakers.content: With a gift for transforming silence into powerful storytelling, Vinitha Koshy navigates between pediatric counseling and award-winning acting, crafting performances so authentic they continue to resonate long after the screen fades to black.

speakers.name: Thajudeen Aboobaker
speakers.content: From humble beginnings to environmental visionary, Thajudeen Aboobaker has redefined waste management through Urban Trash, creating a business model where sustainability and profitability walk hand in hand.

speakers.name: Shruthi Rajanikanth
speakers.content: Alappuzha's versatile gem Shruthi Rajanikanth defies creative boundaries, captivating audiences as Painkili while simultaneously conquering radio, dance, filmmaking, modeling, and fragrance entrepreneurship.

speakers.name: Hashmi Taj Ibrahim
speakers.content: A masterful broadcast journalist who elevates news reporting into an art form, crafting powerful narratives that transform routine information into meaningful discourse that resonates deeply with viewers across Twenty Four News channel.

speakers.name: Geo Joseph
speakers.content: Ingenious creator behind M4 Tech who captivates millions with mind-bending DIY experiments and technological innovations, brilliantly demonstrating how science and entertainment can merge to inspire curiosity and creativity in Kerala's digital landscape.

speakers.name: Jithin Laal
speakers.content: Visionary filmmaker whose storytelling prowess spans from commercials to epic cinema, culminating in his grand fantasy adventure A.R.M., where he continues his tradition of building immersive worlds that redefine extraordinary storytelling.

speakers.name: Pavi Sankar
speakers.content: Revolutionary concept artist and digital satirist whose extraordinary vision brought Kerala's favorite superhero Minnal Murali to life while using his platform to blend humor, politics, and pop culture into thought-provoking illustrations that challenge societal perspectives.
